headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Palantir Stock Jumps as NATO Enlists AI Military System
summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.8% on Monday, April 14, 2025, after smartphones and other electronics were exempted from President Donald Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Palantir Stock Jumps as NATO Enlists AI Military System
raw.summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.8% on Monday, April 14, 2025, after smartphones and other electronics were exempted from President Donald Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs.

headline: Top Stock Movers Now: Palantir, Apple, DaVita, and More
summary: The major U.S. equities indexes edged higher at midday Monday after President Trump temporarily exempted smartphones, computers, and other electronics from his "reciprocal" tariffs.

raw.headline: Top Stock Movers Now: Palantir, Apple, DaVita, and More
raw.summary: The major U.S. equities indexes edged higher at midday Monday after President Trump temporarily exempted smartphones, computers, and other electronics from his "reciprocal" tariffs.

headline: Kidney Disease Treatment Firm DaVita's Stock Falls on Ransomware Attack Disclosure
summary: Shares of DaVita led S&P 500 decliners Monday morning after the dialysis services firm revealed it had suffered a ransomware attack.

raw.headline: Kidney Disease Treatment Firm DaVita's Stock Falls on Ransomware Attack Disclosure
raw.summary: Shares of DaVita led S&P 500 decliners Monday morning after the dialysis services firm revealed it had suffered a ransomware attack.

headline: DaVita Says Ransomware Attack Affecting Some Operations
summary: DaVita has been hit with a ransomware attack that has affected some of the kidney-care company’s operations.

raw.headline: DaVita Says Ransomware Attack Affecting Some Operations
raw.summary: DaVita has been hit with a ransomware attack that has affected some of the kidney-care company’s operations.

headline: Dialysis firm DaVita hit by ransomware attack, says patient care continues
summary: While the dialysis service provider continued to provide patient care as it took measures to restore certain functions, it could not "estimate the duration or extent of the disruption at this time", DaVita said in a regulatory filing.  The measures included separating some impacted systems from its network.  DaVita discovered the cyberattack on Saturday and is now assessing the incident with third-party cybersecurity professionals.

The measures included separating some impacted systems from its network.  DaVita discovered the cyberattack on Saturday and is now assessing the incident with third-party cybersecurity professionals.
